NAME NAME, p.detail_title detailTitle, p.min_price minPrice, p.recommand_status recommandStatus, p.stock_total stockTotal, p.sort sort FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_brand pb ON pb.id = p.brand_id LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute_category ppac ON ppac.id = p.product_attribute_category_id LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute pa ON pa.product_attribute_category_id = ppac.id LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute_value pav ON pa.id = pav.product_attribute_id WHERE p.del_status = 0 AND p.publish_status = 1
AND p.id=#{id}
